meanings.definition: A person who records or writes about the lives of martyrs.
meanings.sent1: The diligent martyrologists meticulously documented the stories of brave martyrs.
meanings.sent2: The library contained many books written by martyrologists detailing the sacrifices of martyrs.
meanings.sent3: The young martyrologists playfully argued about which martyr's story was the most exciting to write about.
meanings.sent4: The pen of the martyrologists was mightier than any sword, preserving the memories of martyrs for generations.
meanings.sent5: In the candlelit room, the martyrologists' words painted vivid pictures of martyrdom.

meanings.sent1: The group of martyrologists gathered to discuss their research on martyrs.
meanings.sent2: The conference hosted many distinguished martyrologists from around the world.
meanings.sent3: The team of martyrologists jokingly called themselves 'The Martyr Squad'.
meanings.sent4: The room buzzed with energy as the martyrologists shared their findings on martyrdom.
meanings.sent5: The martyrologists' unity in purpose made their work impactful and meaningful.
